content: the **spring breeze lace scarf** is an airy and lightweight scarf for chill spring days and summer nights *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 4 0-mm g/6 usa 8 uk crochet hook fingering 1 super fine weight yarn tapestry needle **yarn** i used 2 skeins 492 yds/450 m of katia concept mohair cotton 70% cotton 30% mohair 246 yds/225 m per 50 g color 84 feel free to use any comparable yarn that meets gauge **size** 70 178 cm by 10 25 5 cm **gauge** gauge is not crucial for this project **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni 1 https //raffamusa--madamestitch thrivecart com/wraps-2023-spring-edition-pattern-bundle/63fbd47e2d85d/
